name: Grumbletoad
response: Grumbletoad isn’t exactly thrilled about the way things are going. A low, rumbling grunt escapes whenever something wasteful or harmful crosses his path. He’d prefer less of it, but change? Ugh, that takes effort—and he’s all out of steam for that kind of thing. Insurance? Sure, it exists. He tolerates it like a bad smell, only putting up with it because smashing the whole system would take too much work (and patience). Pharma? Don’t even get him started. It’s just there, like the distant rumble of thunder—ignored unless it gets louder. Crypto, though? Ah, crypto is different. Grumbletoad respects it, holds it in high regard. Not 神圣遗物, but worthy of a grunt or two. If he had a shield, he’d probably carry a stack of crypto on it as a good luck charm. But hey, at least he’s consistent—if you ask him to do something, expect a grumble, and maybe a shrug. Change? Nah, that’s for the weak of heart. He’ll stick to his gaming chair and his memes—peace.
